member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.OnInitialize
member.summary: An overridable method to provide constructor functionality since the constructors are generated.

member.name: P:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.AutoDeleteChildren
member.summary: If true, any references to the current record will be deleted prior to deleting the current record in a call to Delete() if those references have been hydrated on the current instance

member.name: P:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.AutoHydrateChildrenOnDelete
member.summary: If true, will hydrate child collections prior to deletion so that they can be deleted. Incurs performance cost if many child collections must be loaded; can cause intense memory pressure if large amounts of data need to be loaded

member.name: E:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.AfterCommit
member.summary: Fires after this instance has been committed. May be fired as the result of its membership in a DaoCollection, in that case the current Dao instance may not be fully-hydrated at the time of the firing of this event

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.ResetChildren
member.summary: Reset the child collections for this instance forcing them to be reloaded the next time they are referenced.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.ValidateRequiredProperties(System.String[]@)
member.summary: Checks that every required column has a value. Untested as of 05/09/2013 :b

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.Save
member.summary: Save the current instance. If the Id is less than or equal to 0 the current instance will be Inserted, otherwise it will be Updated. Same as Commit

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.SaveAsync(Bam.Net.Data.Database)
member.summary: Saves the current instance asynchronously

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.Save(Bam.Net.Data.Database)
member.summary: Save the current instance. If the Id is less than or equal to 0 the current instance will be Inserted, otherwise it will be Updated. Will also commit any updates to its children, though child commit events will not be triggerred. Same as Save

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.Commit
member.summary: Save the current instance. If the Id is less than or equal to 0 the current instance will be Inserted, otherwise it will be Updated. Will also commit any updates to its children, though child commit events will not be triggerred. Same as Save

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.Commit(Bam.Net.Data.DaoTransaction)
member.summary: Save the current instance. If the Id is less than or equal to 0 the current instance will be Inserted, otherwise it will be Updated. Will also commit any updates to its children, though child commit events will not be triggerred. Same as Save

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.Commit(Bam.Net.Data.Database,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Save the current instance. If the Id is less than or equal to 0 the current instance will be Inserted, otherwise it will be Updated. Will also commit any updates to its children, though child commit events will be triggerred the children should be re-hydrated to ensure they are fully hydrated. Same as Save

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.WriteCommit(Bam.Net.Data.SqlStringBuilder)
member.summary: Write the update or insert statement for the current instance to the specified SqlStringBuilder.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.WriteUpdate(Bam.Net.Data.SqlStringBuilder)
member.summary: Write an update statement into the specified SqlStringBuilder which when executed will update the instance identified by GetUniqueFilter().

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.WriteInsert(Bam.Net.Data.SqlStringBuilder)
member.summary: Write an insert statement into the specified SqlStringBuilder which when executed will insert the current instance.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.Undo(Bam.Net.Data.Database)
member.summary: Undo any changes that have been made to the current instance since it was loaded.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.Undelete(Bam.Net.Data.Database)
member.summary: Re-insert the current instance after it has been deleted

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.ToJsonSafe
member.summary: Creates an in memory dynamic type representing the current Dao's Columns only.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.ToJsonSafe(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an in memory dynamic type representing the current Dao's Columns only.
member.param: Include anything added through the Value method

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.ToDynamic
member.summary: Create an in memory dynamic type representing all the values in DataRow including anything added through the Value method

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.GetNewAssignValues
member.summary: Gets an array of AssignValue instances that represent the names and values of columns with new values

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.GetOldAssignValues
member.summary: Gets an array of AssignValue instances that represent the names and values of columns with old values (prior to any new sets)

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.GetUniqueFilter
member.summary: When implemented by a derived class returns filters that should uniquely identify a single record.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.ConnectionName(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the connection name for the specified Dao instance or the proxied name if the connection name for the specified Dao instance has been proxied

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.ConnectionName(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the connection name for the specified type or the proxied name if the connection name for the specified type has been proxied

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.ProxiedConnectionName(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the proxied connection name for the specified Type if the connection hasn't been proxied/redirected then the real connection name will be returned.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.UnproxyConnection(System.Type)
member.summary: Stop redirecting the connection name for the specified type

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.UnproxyConnection(System.String)
member.summary: Stop redirecting the connection name for the specified type

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.ProxyConnection(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Causes calls to ConnectionName for the specified type to return the specified newConnectionName. This method must be called prior to any XXXRegistrar.Register(Type, "CxName") calls for example: SqlClientRegistrar.Register(typeof(Employee), "MyConnectionName")

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.ProxyConnection(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Causes calls to ConnectionName for the specified originalConnection name to return the specified newConnectionName

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.TableName(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the table name that represents the current Dao type

member.name: P:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.ForceInsert
member.summary: Overrides default logic as to whether to insert or update the current instance based on the state of its Id causing Save to always insert instead of checking whether it should insert or update

member.name: P:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.ForceUpdate
member.summary: Overrides default logic as to whether to insert or update the current instance based on the state of its Id causing Save to always update instead of checking whether it should insert or update

member.name: P:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.IsNew
member.summary: Returns true if the current instance hasn't been committed as determined by whether the IdValue is greater than 0

member.name: P:Bam.Net.Data.Dao.HasNewValues
member.summary: Returns true if properties of the current Dao instance have been set since its instanciation

member.summary: Reload the current collection using the original query used to populate it

member.name: T:Bam.Net.Data.XrefDaoCollection`2
member.summary: A collection that represents a cross reference between its parents and the table represented by L.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.XrefDaoCollection`2.AddNew
member.summary: Adds a new value to the collection in memory. Does not commit to the database until Save is called.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.XrefDaoCollection`2.Add(`1)
member.summary: Adds the value to the collection in memory. Does not commit to the database until Save is called.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.XrefDaoCollection`2.Remove(`1,Bam.Net.Data.Database)
member.summary: Removes the specified item from this collection, deletes the xref entry but does not delete the item from the database

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.XrefDaoCollection`2.Clear(Bam.Net.Data.Database)
member.summary: Deletes all cross reference entries representing associations for the objects in this collection. The objects themselves are not deleted.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Data.XrefDaoCollection`2.Delete(Bam.Net.Data.Database)
member.summary: Delete all the entries in this collection as well as all Xref entries if any.

member.summary: Write a sql script that can be used to delete all the entries in this collection as well as all the Xref entries if any.
